name: Toil 'N Trouble
description:
Toil 'N Trouble was one of the first projects I made. It's no longer in development, but since it can be a bit of fun, I decided I'd make it available for free (donations appreciated and help with development of future games). The gameplay video on the Youtube Channel was recorded before final art was added.

The goal is to finish as many spells as you can! Each missed ingredient, or incorrect ingredient collected counts as a miss. There are 3 difficulty modes which change how many misses can happen before failure, and the speed of ingredients.

Uses mouse only.

Left Click on an ingredient to grab it out of the bubble and let go over the cauldron to let it fall into it, completing that ingredient requirement for the spell. If you perform well, there will be magical essences that appear that boost your points. and letters that spell MAGIC (also providing bonus points).
